title: Mirror of Germany. No. 091 = Deutschland Spiegel
brief_description: Magazine items: Dr Lubke, Federal President, visits Vienna; preparing for summer tourists in Berlin; the Humboldt museum; art prizes for 1962; a children’s music competition in Stuttgart; violin-making in Mittenwald; a satellite tracking station; gymnastic and athletic contests; soccer match between Uruguay and West Germany.
